post.content:
### About

D2C Connect is a platform designed to connect D2C brands with freelance designers. It serves as a marketplace where brands can find and hire talented designers for their projects, while designers can showcase their work and connect with potential clients.

### Tech Stack
- React
- Typescript
- Tailwind CSS
- ShadCN
post.title: DTC Connect
post.description: A platform to connect D2C brands with freelance designers.
